title: Harvard University Pre-College - Quantum Computing
short_description: Studied quantum information and quantum computation in intensive college-level course with full scholarship
full_description: Quantum Information and Quantum Computation (CSCIP-14340) - two-week intensive, college-level course. Studied Hermitian conjugation, Hilbert spaces, the Bloch sphere, and quantum hardware systems. Designed a quantum circuit simulation in Mathematica to model quantum entanglement. Received a full scholarship for the residential program.
highlights: Advanced topics: Hilbert spaces, Bloch sphere
